name: Budget request
text: §30-6  Budget request.  The governor shall include in the budget transmitted to the legislature, for each fiscal year in which the governor's regular term of office will expire, a request for appropriation of $100,000 for carrying out the purposes of this chapter. [L 1972, c 126, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1988, c 9, §1]
